channel.title: Hosting server
channel.description: how many RAM would i need for hosting 50 players? any1 know a good VPS? and will i need to portforward/install java aigan if i get vps?

item.title: Hosting server
item.dc:creator: @jaspertjeoo jaspertjeoo
item.description:
@jaspertjeoo wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:4, topic:390968"][quote author=jaspertjeoo link=topic=486917.msg3568694#msg3568694 date=1302874620]

You need too be more concerned about upload speed, and yes, you will need to port-forward and install Java JDK in order too compile the source files.

Normally you can open ports on a VPS through the administrative control panel.

thanks for the info!!!
vpsland is the best one to use?
[/quote]

vpsland is the worst vps provider you could use.[/quote]
than…which one :c xlshosting?

Read full topic
